attributes.action:
No to digital ID 
Us the British people do not want digital id
attributes.additional_details:
We feel this would be a step towards mass surveillance and digital control, and that no one should be forced to register with a state-controlled ID system. We oppose the creation of any national ID system. The digital id won't make a difference to illegal migrants.
Digital ID  were scrapped in 2010, in our view for good reason.  Not everyone has a mobile phone dose this mean they will suffer lose out?
Would be nice for the government to listen to what the British people want for are community.
attributes.background:
We do not want digital id 
We the British people feel it's a breach of are personal lives. We do not want to be on a system were everything we do will be watched and monitored. We've seen how it works in other countries and it's not for us we don't want it.
